name: DC4EU PDA1 SD-JWT VCTM
description: DC4EU Portable Document A1 (PDA1) SD-JWT Verifiable Credential Type Metadata, based on ietf-oauth-sd-jwt-vc (draft 09), using a single language tag (en-US).
$comment: Implementation of the DC4EU VCTM may require Member State-specific clarifications to align with national policies governing the display of included claims.

display.name: PDA1 SD-JWT VC
display.description: Portable Document A1 (PDA1) SD-JWT VC.

display.label: Social Security PIN
display.description: Unique personal identifier used by social security services.

display.label: Employer id
display.description: Employer unique identifier in EU or Member State registries.

display.label: Employer name
display.description: Employer name in EU or Member State registries.

display.label: Employer country
display.description: Country where the employer is registered.

display.label: Full workplace address
display.description: Full formatted address of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace street
display.description: Street name of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace building number
display.description: Street number or building of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace ZIP
display.description: Postal or ZIP code of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace city
display.description: Municipality, city, town, or village of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace state
display.description: State, province, or regional division of the workplace.

display.label: Workplace country
display.description: Country where the workplace is located.

display.label: Applicable legislation
display.description: Country whose legislation is to be applied during the work abroad.

display.label: Status Confirmation:
display.description: Status Confirmation, which defines the exact applicable legal framework for the worker.

display.label: Issuing authority id
display.description: PDA1 issuing authority unique identifier.

display.label: Issuing authority name
display.description: PDA1 issuing authority name.

display.label: Issuing country
display.description: PDA1 issuing country.

display.label: Expiry date
display.description: PDA1 expiration date.

display.label: Issue date
display.description: PDA1 validity start date.

display.label: Competent institution id
display.description: Identifier of the competent insitution as registered in the EESSI Institution Repository.

display.label: Competent institution name
display.description: Name of the competent insitution as registered in the EESSI Institution Repository.

display.label: Ending date
display.description: End date of the business decision validity period of the PDA1.

display.label: Starting date
display.description: Start date of the business decision validity period of the PDA1.

display.label: Document number
display.description: PDA1 unique document identifier.
